item.title: Velociraptor Artifacts
item.description: Velociraptor’s main job is to collect Forensic Artifacts. An artifact is simply a yaml file which tells Velociraptor how to collect a set of files or information in order to answer a specific question. Artifact definitions Artifacts are supposed to be defined and tweaked by the user. Therefore they are defined using YAML in a simple file format. Below is an example of a typical artifact definition. name: Windows.Sys.Users description: | List User accounts that were logged into the machine in the past by searching for registry artifacts.
